description: couple in shadows at left; house behind trees and bushes at right, with rolling hills; tall tree at center middle ground; small horizontal separate scene below larger image with building at left, figures and boats on shore
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2005; sold in April for IOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Retour des Champs
